title: Legal Consultation Services
short_description: Professional legal advice and guidance for individuals and companies.
content: Our Legal Consultation Services provide clients with professional legal advice across commercial, civil, corporate, and labor laws. We help assess risks, understand legal positions, and make informed decisions.
seo_description: Expert legal consultation for companies and individuals across multiple legal fields.

title: Foreign Investment Services
short_description: Complete legal support for foreign investors entering the Saudi market.
content: We assist foreign investors with licensing, compliance, documentation, and establishing companies in Saudi Arabia according to the Ministry of Investment regulations.
seo_description: Legal guidance for foreign investors including licensing and compliance.

title: Contracts
short_description: Drafting, reviewing, and negotiating commercial and legal contracts.
content: We professionally draft and review various contracts such as commercial, employment, franchise, partnership, and service agreements ensuring fairness and legal compliance.
seo_description: Professional drafting and review of commercial and legal contracts.

title: Defense in All Cases
short_description: Comprehensive legal defense across civil, commercial, and criminal cases.
content: We represent clients in all types of legal cases, preparing defenses, submitting memorandums, attending hearings, and ensuring strong legal representation.
seo_description: Defense services for civil, commercial, labor, and criminal cases.

title: Services for Companies and Institutions
short_description: Legal solutions tailored for companies, enterprises, and institutions.
content: We support companies with contract drafting, compliance, corporate governance, legal representation, and establishing internal regulations.
seo_description: Legal services for companies including compliance and corporate support.

title: Banks and Financial Institutions
short_description: Legal services specialized for financial institutions.
content: We provide legal advisory, documentation, dispute resolution, and compliance support for banks, lenders, and financial institutions.
seo_description: Legal support for banks and financial institutions.

title: Arbitration
short_description: Professional arbitration services for commercial and contractual disputes.
content: We represent clients in arbitration proceedings, prepare case files, draft arbitration agreements, and provide settlement strategies.
seo_description: Arbitration support for commercial and civil disputes.

title: Notarization
short_description: Notarization and authentication of documents and contracts.
content: We assist with notarizing documents, confirming signatures, authenticating agreements, and preparing legally binding documents.
seo_description: Document authentication and contract notarization services.

title: Insurance
short_description: Legal support related to insurance claims and policies.
content: We assist clients with insurance disputes, policy reviews, claim submissions, and negotiations with insurance providers.
seo_description: Insurance claim support and policy review services.

title: Corporate Governance Services
short_description: Governance framework development for companies and institutions.
content: We help organizations implement governance standards, board structures, compliance controls, and internal policies.
seo_description: Governance development and compliance services for companies.

title: Companies Liquidation
short_description: Legal assistance in dissolving and liquidating companies.
content: We manage the full liquidation process including regulatory filings, settlement of obligations, and preparing final reports.
seo_description: Legal support for dissolving and liquidating companies.

title: Internal Regulations for Companies
short_description: Preparing internal policies and regulations for companies.
content: We prepare internal laws, governance manuals, HR regulations, and compliance documents tailored to each organization.
seo_description: Creation of internal policies and governance rules for companies.

title: Intellectual Property
short_description: Protection of trademarks, copyrights, and intellectual rights.
content: We help register trademarks, protect copyrights, manage IP disputes, and enforce intellectual property rights.
seo_description: Trademark registration and intellectual property protection.

title: Corporate Restructuring and Reorganization
content: We guide companies through restructuring, mergers, acquisitions, and organizational realignment.
seo_description: Business restructuring, mergers, and organizational transformation.

title: Establishing National and Foreign Companies
content: We handle company registration, licensing, documentation, and legal support for both local and foreign entities.
seo_description: Establishing national and foreign companies with full legal support.

title: Commercial Agencies
short_description: Legal services for commercial agency agreements.
content: We draft, review, and register commercial agency contracts and resolve related disputes.
seo_description: Legal support for establishing and managing commercial agencies.

title: Supporting Vision 2030
short_description: Legal services aligned with Vision 2030 transformation goals.
content: We support businesses and investors participating in Vision 2030 initiatives, ensuring compliance with evolving regulations.
seo_description: Legal guidance for projects aligned with Saudi Vision 2030.

title: Estates
short_description: Legal services related to estates and inheritances.
content: We manage estate division, inheritance disputes, wills, and legal documentation related to property transfers.
seo_description: Legal support for estates, wills, and inheritance matters.
